item.description: Document /* Primary - #02ddee Complementary - #ff7d5e Primary - #7ddae4 Complementary - #e4877d */ :root { --primary-color: #02ddee; --complementary-color: #ff7d5e ; } * { box-sizing: border-box; } html { font-size: 16px; } body { margin: 0; font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; background-color: #f2f2f2; } .form-container { background-color: #fff; max-width: 450px; width: 95%; margin: auto; padding: 40px; /* 05.html: */ box-shadow: 0 0 10px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); /*11 01.html:*/ margin-top: 50px; } #form { } input { display: block; width: 100%; margin: 0.
